title: shAntamAi Om
sahitya:
shAntamAi Om hari Om hari Om ena 
sAdhanam shei manamE japa sAdhanam shei manamE


anupallavi

  kAntam pOl uLLattaik-kavarndu kalandiDum 
kaNNanait-taN mukhil vaNNanai eNNiyE


caraNam    pErattilum AravArattilum oru kAriyam illai nenjE Arat-teLinda 
nal anbaruDan vEda sAram adAna OmkAra shrutiyuDanE
